org.uimafit.util
Class JCasUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.uimafit.util.JCasUtil

public class JCasUtil
extends Object

Utility methods for convenient access to the JCas.

Author:
Richard Eckart de Castilho, Philip Ogren, Niklas Jakob

subiterate

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> Iterable<T> subiterate(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                                                                      Class<T> type,
                                                                                      org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation container,
                                                                                      boolean ambiguous,
                                                                                      boolean strict)
Convenience method to iterator over all annotations of a given type occurring within the scope of a provided annotation (sub-iteration).

Type Parameters:
T - the iteration type.
Parameters:
jCas - a JCas.
container - the containing annotation.
type - the type.
ambiguous - If set to false, resulting iterator will be unambiguous.
strict - Controls if annotations that overlap to the right are considered in or out.
Returns:
A sub-iterator iterable.
See Also:
AnnotationIndex.subiterator(AnnotationFS, boolean, boolean)

Parameters:

selectCovered

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.cas.text.AnnotationFS> List<T> selectCovered(Class<T> type,
                                                                                      org.apache.uima.cas.text.AnnotationFS coveringAnnotation)
Get a list of annotations of the given annotation type constrained by a 'covering' annotation. Iterates over all annotations of the given type to find the covered annotations. Does not use subiterators.

Type Parameters:
T - the JCas type.
Parameters:
type - a UIMA type.
coveringAnnotation - the covering annotation.
Returns:
a return value.
See Also:
Subiterator

selectCovered

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> List<T> selectCovered(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                                                                     Class<T> type,
                                                                                     org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation coveringAnnotation)
Get a list of annotations of the given annotation type constrained by a 'covering' annotation. Iterates over all annotations of the given type to find the covered annotations. Does not use subiterators.

Type Parameters:
T - the JCas type.
Parameters:
jCas - a JCas containing the annotation.
type - a UIMA type.
coveringAnnotation - the covering annotation.
Returns:
a return value.
See Also:
Subiterator

isCovered

public static boolean isCovered(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation coveringAnnotation,
                                Class<? extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> type)
Check if the given annotation contains any annotation of the given type.

Parameters:
jCas - a JCas containing the annotation.
coveringAnnotation - the covering annotation.
type - a UIMA type.
Returns:
if an annotation of the given type is present.

selectByIndex

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation> T selectByIndex(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                                                               Class<T> cls,
                                                                               int index)
This method exists simply as a convenience method for unit testing. It is not very efficient and should not, in general be used outside the context of unit testing.

Type Parameters:
T - JCas wrapper type.
Parameters:
jCas - a JCas containing the annotation.
cls - a UIMA type.
index - this can be either positive (0 corresponds to the first annotation of a type) or negative (-1 corresponds to the last annotation of a type.)
Returns:
an annotation of the given type

selectSingle

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.cas.FeatureStructure> T selectSingle(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                                                              Class<T> type)
Get the single instance of the specified type from the JCas.

Type Parameters:
T - JCas wrapper type.
Parameters:
jCas - a JCas containing the annotation.
type - a UIMA type.
Returns:
the single instance of the given type. throws IllegalArgumentException if not exactly one instance if the given type is present.

selectPreceding

                                                                                       int count)
Returns the n annotations preceding the given annotation

Type Parameters:
T - the JCas type.
Parameters:
aJCas - a JCas.
aType - a type.
annotation - anchor annotation
count - number of annotations to collect
Returns:

exists

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.cas.text.AnnotationFS> boolean exists(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                                                               Class<T> aType)
Test if a JCas contains an annotation of the given type.

Type Parameters:
T - the annotation type.
Parameters:
aJCas - a JCas.
aType - a annotation class.
Returns:
true if there is at least one annotation of the given type in the JCas.

getView

public static org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas getView(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                                String viewName,
                                                org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas fallback)
Convenience method to get the specified view or a default view if the requested view does not exist. The default can also be null.

Parameters:
aJCas - a JCas
viewName - the requested view.
fallback - the default view if the requested view does not exist.
Returns:
the requested view or the default if the requested view does not exist.

getView

public static org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas getView(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                                String viewName,
                                                boolean aCreate)
                                         throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
Convenience method to get the specified view or create a new view if the requested view does not exist.

Parameters:
aJCas - a JCas
viewName - the requested view.
aCreate - the view is created if it does not exist.
Returns:
the requested view
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException - if the view does not exist and is not to be created.

toText

public static <T extends org.apache.uima.cas.text.AnnotationFS> List<String> toText(Iterable<T> iterable)
Fetch the text covered by the specified annotations and return it as a list of strings.

Type Parameters:
T - UIMA JCas type.
Parameters:
iterable - annotation container.
Returns:
list of covered strings.
